Text:
Damnit, DRM protected m4a files! If you rip something, rip it properly. 

The only way to convert this to mp3 is installing stupid iTunes, then burn or emulate this and convert. I chose another, shorter way: the trash bin!
Just so you know, you can use the Apple Lossless plugin for Foobar2k to convert M4A files...
Please seed!  Will seed for a long while in return!  Also, Sabrage is right, no need to burn a CD, just use any free audio format converter.
